updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the routine was last updated.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the routine was created.

index.description: Index indicating the order of the exercise in the routine.

rest_seconds.description: The rest time in seconds between sets of the exercise

notes.example: Focus on form. Go down to 90 degrees.

exercise_template_id.description: The id of the exercise template. This can be used to fetch the exercise template.

supersets_id.description: The id of the superset that the exercise belongs to. A value of null indicates the exercise is not part of a superset.

index.description: Index indicating the order of the set in the routine.

type.description: The type of set. This can be one of 'normal', 'warmup', 'dropset', 'failure'

reps.description: Number of reps logged for the set

rep_range.description: Range of reps for the set, if applicable

start.description: Starting rep count for the range

end.description: Ending rep count for the range

distance_meters.description: Number of meters logged for the set

duration_seconds.description: Number of seconds logged for the set

rpe.description: RPE (Relative perceived exertion) value logged for the set

custom_metric.description: Custom metric logged for the set (Currently only used to log floors or steps for stair machine exercises)
